name: Rebecca Osborne
text: We love our local pizza plus, they are always super nice and our order is always perfect.

name: Douglas Solano
text: Extremely friendly staff with good quality pizza, nice dining room area.

name: Ricky Hamilton
text: Placed order for two large chilli  bacon and cheese  curly fries and when we got our order it had no chilli on them so we called back an was told they would bring us two cups of chili and no one ever showed!! Wont be placing  any more orders there!!

name: tommy hilton
text: Clean, great salad bar and friendly service..they went out of thier way to make me a low/no carb pizza and it was great!! The hostess was friendly and service was very good!! Highly recommend

name: Rillwill
text: Probably the best pizza I've had in a long time. Really been sketched out about delivery and take out lately but I can't really go without pizza. With no oven in the hotel room it's nice  having a delivery driver pull up with a mask making ‚Ä¶More

name: George Lynch
text: Very good pizza and sandwiches.  Service was very good.

name: Sharon Shook
text: Fast service and good pizza today! Thanks for wearing a mask too!! Courteous and friendly!

name: Emily Malsam
text: The pizza was about as generic as the name, but it was good. Their real winning area was the fantastic customer service we received. Logan was very polite and welcoming! Thank you for the nice experience after our long hike!

name: Hi Jk
text: Do not eat at any pizza plus establishment, especially the one in Duffield. Absolutely horrible service. If your that hungry, be sure to just go eat tree bark.

name: Christy Lee
text: The service was good. The pizza came out really fast. The salad bar was well-stocked and clean. The bathroom was clean. The price was reasonable for what we ordered. I have no complaints.

name: Opal Evans
text: The California chicken pizza is my favorite. They now offer cauliflower pizza crust; which is a healthier option compared to pan crust. They have specials often and prices are reasonable. The bacon cheese fries are 1 of their excellent appetizers.

name: Jeremy Owens
text: Empmoyees are wonderful there, actually its the best pizza ive got in a long time.

name: Dustin Ferrell
text: Great pizza

name: Bubba Clinton
text: Nice staff but this was hardly "pizza'. Paper thin crust which wasn't near as good as the pretty dry toppings. I wanted to try it and it's about what I expected, pretty bad. Overall you get what you pay for and I will say it was cheap.

name: Khai K
text: Everyone is very friendly and nice. The place is clean, and prices are good. However, the pizza was pretty meh-not nasty, just extremely bland. ‚Ä¶More

name: Wythe Morris
text: Had the buffet.  Salad was very good, good selection.  Same with the pizza. Good lunch stop.

name: Peace Love And Hope
text: The Gluten free pizza is amazing absolutely love it and it is all I can order so I am very thrilled that they are finally offering gf pizza I can buy locally:).

name: Glenn R
text: Great buffet with many pizza selections, always hot and plentiful. Bountiful salad bar.

name: Tony Reed
text: Good pizza ,if pizza is your thing . My choice is the salad bar. Loved it. Best one I know of anywhere near here. Easy to get in and out plenty of seating. Come have a great meal.

name: Ralph Bartley
text: Great buffet!  Right up to 2 pm they were still bringing out fresh pizzas!

name: Preston Joyce
text: I like their buffet. It includes ü•ó, üçï, cheese sticks with marinara sauce, and cinnamon sticks.

name: Rick Harris
text: Pizza is ok...hot wings are better !!

name: Kimberly Turner
text: Friendly staff, awesome buffet prices & great food!

name: Select User
text: The crew here is wonderful. They do a good job and keep the place clean.

name: Nathan Daugherty
text: Rude staff. Refuses to do special orders.

name: Roger Harber
text: Love the wings and.pizza great place to eat

name: Mark Jenkins
text: Good food

name: Lynn Hensley
text: Good place to go in and enjoy fresh pizza.

name: Lisa Dingus
text: The service is excellent. The people that work here are so friendly, kind and always asked if u need anything. I recommend this place to everyone.

name: Jason Miller
text: Great pizza and staff. Eat there for the 1st time tonight and definitely a great place.

name: Carico
text: I eat there all the time mostly delivery but always just a normal pizza but today Cody smith delivered to my house and honestly it was the best pizza I have ever eat and he got here sooner than expected thank u pizza plus for awesome pizza for now on I will request for Cody if this is possible

name: Jamie Ramsey
text: I love pizza plus because of their food

name: Julia Darnell
text:
If you're looking for a comfortable & friendly environment, you've found it. This place is prefect for families of all kind. Take mine for example:
I have two young children that I love dearly but I failed at parenting. You see, ‚Ä¶More

text: I love pizza plus the best pizza place ever

name: michelle thacker
text: Great, fresh food and great service!!

name: F Heath
text: I always get good food and fast delivery thank you.

name: GiGi Green
text: Great pizza buffet and salad bar. Nice waitress! Wish we had Pizza Plus in Arizona.

name: Virginia C
text:
I enjoy this place very much!
Great food, I've tried most of the foods and I have been much pleased, always super clean, the best part the employees are great, super friendly, attentive, very prompt.

name: melissa hensley
text: Love Pizza Plus especially chicken club. It's my favorite. Love to pizza too.

Food was good service  was good but the men's restroom needs attention
Otherwise it was good

name: Michael Jackson
text: Eating here one a week has become a ritual. Love the food and the service.

name: Jerry Campbell
text: It's better than starving. Like eating a box the crust was hard, pizzas had obviously been on the table for some time.

name: wanda blevins
text: Just okay...Our pizza took way way too long (over a hour 10 min) and was not even done when we finally got it. Terrible selection of salad and dessert!

name: Jody M.
text: Hands down my favorite pizza place.

name: Karl Palutke
text: Good pizza, quick service.

text: Have really good pizza and more.

name: Justin Skaggs
